name: nekudot
description: Add 'nekudot' or diacritics to hebrew text.

scripts.copy: cp manifest.json popup.html button.css dist/ && cp images/* dist/images/ && cp model/* dist/model/
scripts.build: parcel build popup.js background.js -d dist -o popup --no-minify && mkdir dist/images && mkdir dist/model && npm run copy
scripts.build-dev: NODE_ENV=development parcel build popup.js background.js -d dist -o popup --no-minify && mkdir dist/images && mkdir dist/model && npm run copy

author: Gilad Amar
